actions.description: Aurnozci makes one Bite attack and two Tail attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d12 + 8) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: Aurnozci sprays mucus in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that cone must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Mucus Spray (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
Aurnozci casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
At will: Detect Magic, Heat Metal (7th-level version)

2/day each: Darkness, Dispel Magic, Hold Person
actions.name: Spellcasting

actions.description: Aurnozci moves up to its speed.
actions.name: Move

actions.description: Flames momentarily surround Aurnozci. Each creature within 15 feet of Aurnozci must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Conflagration (Costs 2 Actions)

damageImmunities: acid, fire, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
name: Aurnozci [BMT]

specialTraits.description: If the temperature around it is 100 degrees Fahrenheit or higher, Aurnozci regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Aurnozci dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
specialTraits.name: Heat Regeneration

specialTraits.description: If Aurnozci fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: Aurnozci has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
